page.title: 12RADIO STATION
page.content:
THE RADIO STATION
The Radio Station at Highbridge is the biggest in the world.The proper name of the station is {PORTISHEAD RADIO {STATION}.The old part of the station was built in 1927 and the wings were added in 1940 & 1970.In 1982 the new station was completed.150 people are employed there.The radio station is capable of sending messages to ships all round the world.The main way of communicating is by telex,morse code & voice.The Radio Station is also connected with Somerton,Ongar, Leafield & Ruby Stations.It once had 33 aerials but now it's only got one.This connects it to the other stations by micro waves,so communications are extremely rapid.
